attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: gordon, we want you to battle on to the death! and to keep focused on what matters to the people of this country - a strong economy and a leader with a fighting spirit... do not, ever, give in to the back stabbing, in fighters who offer no alternative. You, have served this country admirably and it is your duty to continue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
